summary: When 15-year-old Tina becomes pregnant, her parents must grapple not only with their own current marital crisis, but also their opposing views on adoption.
cast: Park Overall|Kirsten Dunst|David Andrews|Margot Demeter|Karen Trumbo|Julia Whelan|Zachary Ray Sherman|Daniel Kountz|Marlyn Mason|Katee Sackhoff|Tyler Gannon|Sherilyn Lawson|Joe Ivy|Rebecca Nachison|Jan Brehm|Angela Uherbelau|Kaci Baxter|Skylar Thiel-Klare|Karina Thiel-Klare|Art Burke|Katie McClellan|Kerry Evans|John Kenower|Sharon Mitchell|Victor Morris|Raissa Fleming|Meg Luckcuck|Karen Johnson-Miller|Jennifer McKechnie|Mark Donnell
title: Madre adolescente
